title: cmd/gc: nil pointer in switch expression reports panic located at second case clause
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/kh1tDe-Cl3

What is the expected output?
A panic reported at line 13 (switch statement) or maybe line 14 (the first case clause).

What do you see instead?
A panic reported at line 16 (the second case clause).


Please provide any additional information below.
For debugging it would certainly be best if the panic pointed at the switch statement
itself; otherwise the first case clause.  The second case clause is quite a surprise.
